get.description: Get all configs in the namespace

parameters.description: limit number of returned data. Default: 100
parameters.name: limit

post.description: Create a config in the namespace with the given key

Created account profile related config values.

**Supported Config Key:**
  * uniqueDisplayNameEnabled
  * usernameDisabled
  * displayNameSyncMode
  * avatarSyncMode

get.description:
Get account profile related config values.
      
**Supported Config Key:**
  * uniqueDisplayNameEnabled
  * usernameDisabled
  * displayNameSyncMode
  * avatarSyncMode

put.description:
Update account profile related config values.
      
**Supported Config Key:**
  * uniqueDisplayNameEnabled
  * usernameDisabled
  * displayNameSyncMode
  * avatarSyncMode

get.description: Get a config by namespace and key

delete.description: Delete a config by namespace and key.

patch.description: Update a config by namespace and key

get.description: Get an email sender for the requested namespace. If email sender in the requested namespace didn't configured yet or not verified yet, and ALLOW_FALLBACK_TO_PUBLISHER_EMAIL_SENDER environment was activated, it will return email sender of the configured publisher namespace.

parameters.description: Include related email templates in the response (default: false)
parameters.name: includeEmailTemplates

post.description:
Set an email sender of the namespace and request domain authentication to the email platform (currently only SendGrid supported).

**Email Sender API Key Logic:**
If there's no Email Sender API Key defined yet in the requested namespace, the API logic will fallback to use Publisher Namespace API Key.

patch.description:
Update email sender of the specified namespace.

These attributes can be updated:
	- fromAddress (the domain name of the email address must be similar with the existing)
	- fromName

get.description: Get all available API key account names.
get.summary: Get email templates of an account

parameters.description: account name of the email template
parameters.name: account

put.description: Create email templates which will be used for email sending. Currently only support SendGrid platform email templates.
put.summary: Create or update email templates of an account

parameters.description: account name of the email template
parameters.name: account

delete.description: Delete email templates of an account.
delete.summary: Delete email templates of an account

parameters.description: account name of the email template
parameters.name: account

get.description:
Get all available API key accounts in the namespace, including the API key and its use count.
It will return records from all namespaces if the **namespace** path param equals to configured publisher namespace.

post.description: Add an API key account which will be used for email sending. Currently only support SendGrid platform API Key.

parameters.description: account name of the API key
parameters.name: account

get.description: Get email senders that linked with API Key account.
get.summary: Get email senders that linked with API Key account

parameters.description: account name of the API key
parameters.name: account

get.description: Get email sender domain authentication status.

post.description:
Verify the authentication of the email sender domain. 

If verification is failed, it will return 400 error.

get.description: It will return a publisher namespace config of the given namespace and key.
get.summary: Get a config by key and namespace

get.description: Get all public configs in the namespace
Get public config by namespace and key

account.description: sender's account that associated with the api key

isPublic.description: if the config is set to public, it will be accessible from the public get endpoints

account.description: sender's account that associated with the api key. max length is 50, only allow alpha numeric, hyphen and underscore

fromAddress.description: from address. max length is 50, only accept valid email address format

fromName.description: from name. max length is 50, only allow alpha numeric and space

account.description: sender's account that associated with the api key

apiKey.description: sender's apikey. the value will be masked, except if the requester are client credentials or super user credential

useCount.description: the count of how many times the apikey is used for domain authentication

dns.description: DNS records that need to configure in DNS provider in order to allow the domain authentication

isDomainAuthenticated.description: false means the DNS of the domain are not properly configured yet

apiKey.description: sender's apikey. the value will be masked, except if the requester are client credentials or super user credential

emailTemplates.description: email templates that associated with the sender's account. only returned when includeEmailTemplates query param is set to true

isDomainAuthenticated.description: false means the DNS of the domain are not properly configured yet
false means the DNS records of the domain are not properly configured yet

templateName.description: template name. max length is 50, only allow alpha numeric and underscore

isDomainAuthenticated.description: false means the DNS of the domain are not properly configured yet

isPublic.description: if the config is set to public, it will be accessible from the public get endpoints

fromAddress.description: from address. max length is 50, only accept valid email address format

fromName.description: from name. max length is 50, only allow alpha numeric and space
